text: NO SUCH THING AS "KOSOVA" ONLY "KOSOVO" YOU IGNORANT BAFOONS. YOU CANNOT CHANGE A THOUSAND YEAR OLD NAME INTO SOMETHING THAT SUITS A MAJORITY WHO HAVE NO HISTIRICAL TIES TO THE PROVINCE. HISTORY CANNOT BE CHANGED THATS WHY WE HAVE ENCYCLOPAEDIAS SO DONT INSERT FALSE PORPAGANDA INFORMATION INTO SUCH ENCYCLOPAEDIAS!!!
